mapper.update: update project set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, disabled = #{disabled,jdbcType=BIT}, team_id = #{teamId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, due_time = #{dueTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, name, disabled, team_id, due_time, end_time, create_time, description, status from project where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, name, disabled, team_id, due_time, end_time, create_time, description, status from project
